sourcesContent:
import React, { useState } from 'react'; import ProcessingInformation from './ProcessingInformation'; // Import the ProcessingInformation component function Form() { const [alienRegistrationNumber, setAlienRegistrationNumber] = useState(['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']); const [arrivalDepartureRecordNumber, setArrivalDepartureRecordNumber] = useState(['', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '', '']); const [showProcessingInformation, setShowProcessingInformation] = useState(false); // State to control visibility const handleAlienRegistrationChange = (e, index) => { const newValue = e.target.value; // Validate the input to allow only digits from 0 to 9 if (/^[0-9]$/.test(newValue)) { const newDigit = [...alienRegistrationNumber]; newDigit[index] = newValue; setAlienRegistrationNumber(newDigit); } }; const handleArrivalDepartureChange = (e, index) => { const newValue = e.target.value; // Validate the input to allow only digits from 0 to 9 if (/^[0-9]$/.test(newValue)) { const newDigit = [...arrivalDepartureRecordNumber]; newDigit[index] = newValue; setArrivalDepartureRecordNumber(newDigit); } }; const handleNext = (e) => { e.preventDefault(); const formattedAlienRegistrationNumber = 'A-' + alienRegistrationNumber.join(''); const formattedArrivalDepartureRecordNumber = arrivalDepartureRecordNumber.join(''); // Send formattedAlienRegistrationNumber and formattedArrivalDepartureRecordNumber to the backend for processing console.log(formattedAlienRegistrationNumber); // For demonstration purposes, log the data console.log(formattedArrivalDepartureRecordNumber); setShowProcessingInformation(true); }; return (

Immigration Form

{/* Alien Registration Number */}
A- {alienRegistrationNumber.map((section, index) => ( handleAlienRegistrationChange(e, index)} maxLength="1" pattern="\d" required={index === 0} // Require the first section style={{ width: '20px', // Set the width for each digit input marginRight: '5px', // Add some spacing between digits textAlign: 'center', // Center-align the digit }} /> ))}
{/* Country of Birth */}
{/* Province of Birth */}
{/* Country of Citizenship or Nationality */}
5. If the beneficiary is in the United States, complete the following:
{/* Date of Last Arrival */}
{/* Arrival-Departure Record Number */}
{arrivalDepartureRecordNumber.map((section, index) => ( handleArrivalDepartureChange(e, index)} maxLength="1" pattern="\d" required={index === 0} // Require the first section style={{ width: '20px', // Set the width for each digit input marginRight: '5px', // Add some spacing between digits textAlign: 'center', // Center-align the digit }} /> ))}
6. Current Residential U.S. Address (if applicable) (do not list a P.O. Box)
); } export default Form;
